title: Man Cook

verbs: To prepare a meal or a single dish.
nouns: Person who cooks professionally for other people
A person whose profession is to prepare food for customers.
A person who prepares food for a living.
A professional who prepares food for consumption
Someone who cooks food
A cook is a person who prepares food for consumption.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.

An adult male human.

An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A person whose profession is to prepare food for customers.
A chef is a person who is a highly skilled professional cook who is proficient in all aspects of food preparation.

A professional proficient in all aspects of food preparation
A person that has prepared a meal.

description:
A man responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat.

Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg, though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man cook emoji is depicted with a professional and approachable demeanor, sporting a crisp white chef's hat and often a dab of sauce or flour on his apron, all rendered with Apple's signature 3D shading and realistic lighting. His facial expression is typically amiable, suggesting expertise and a passion for culinary arts, while the subtle details in his attire and posture convey a sense of readiness to create delicious food. This emoji is perfect for discussing food, cooking, or celebrating culinary achievements with a touch of professional flair.
